Class sleepState

java.lang.Object
classes.sleepState
All Implemented Interfaces:
State
public class sleepState extends Object implements State
The sleepState class represents the pet being asleep. While in this state, all commands are disabled. Sleep increases over time, and once max sleep is reached, the pet wakes up and returns to a normal state. Health decreases if sleep was triggered due to exhaustion.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Darsh Srikanth

    • increaseSleep

      public void increaseSleep()
      Gradually increases sleep by 1 point per second until max. Once sleep reaches 100, pet wakes up and returns to previous state.
